lines.text: That's one of those irregular verbs, isn't it? I give confidential security briefings. You leak. He has been charged under section 2a of the Official Secrets Act.

[Talking about Government reports]
it could be argued that the Sermon on the Mount, were it a government report, would never have been published.
All that nonsense about the meek inheriting the Earth.
It could do irreparable damage to the defence budget!
It's always a victory of the heartless over the mindless.
If you're going to do this damn silly thing, don't do it in this damn silly way.
